name: Victory Reliable Services, LLC
text: Good place to get all utility, gas, sewer, storm drain, water, fire hydrant, etc. pvc, steel piping and some other materials, covers and related.

text: Great selection of parts, easy to work with, good pricing. My go-to place for process piping from r my business.

text: Been buying pipe and fittings there since 1991. Excellent place to do business with.

name: Bobby Bright
text: Faren was very helpful and professional. I will be returning to do business.

name: David Carlson
text: Great place to unload. Friendly people..

name: Aaron Sims
text: They are very bad at paying employees. Been on several jobs, where several hundred workers would miss a check, their payroll employee was always reluctant to send paystubs, she also made hundred of thousands of dollars from paying employees who did not work there anymore. They didn't fire her, the owner took over her house and let her continue on doing a terrible job, the owner of the company is very tyrannical, and sees his employees as a mean to an end. He treats everyone as a personal servant and not a respective employee, people who have worked there for years and did good jobs were treated with the upmost disrespect, the managers are very crooked, and only the owner and managers make any money. They lose money on every job, and pay there incompetent managers with more respect, than their competent mangers. If only it was possible to give zero stars. Save yourself and never under any circumstance throw your life away. Work hard and find something better.

name: Stephen Guy
text: Great staff! Very helpful.

name: Dustin Shannon
text: Kenny & Company is the most friendliest, helpful, knowledgeable and honest Bath and Kitchen showroom in Northern Alabama. Melanie sure enjoyed assisting my partner and I with searching for that right Freestanding Tub for our bathroom remodel. It was a stressful experience because I tried to work with another company in Huntsville and was discriminated. Melanie gave me the best customer service, I am not sure what I would have done if it wasn't for her. I definitely recommend anyone who needs help with anything relating to Bathrooms and Kitchens to Melanie/Kenny & Company!!! Melanie is the Tub Queen of Alabama 💚

name: David Gentry
text: Told by salesman that he knows nothing about plumbing... customer needs to know what they want...wow...I'd hire experienced employees...who can up sale products and help customers get what they need for the job...prices high...rude service..want be back...

resp.text:
Good afternoon, David. We are so sorry to hear about your poor experience in Selma. We have reached out to the branch manager. If you would like to provide additional information, or a contact number for a follow up call, please email nick.price@southernpipe.com.

Thank you
Nick

resp.text: Thanks Joseph! We appreciate your business!

name: Rush K
text: Not bad

name: Keith Oates
text: Get the best and avoid the rest

name: ROBO EL MAGNIFICO
text: Fire Protection saves lives and Great people work doing great things,

name: Renarda Bailey
text: Love to work here

name: Donny Davis
text: Wonderful place to shop for fire sprinklers.

name: J and R Crank
text: Bring a lot of food and sleep. Been here for almost 10hrs getting loaded. And when I went in and asked if it was done at 11:30pm. They couldn’t find the Bol. They told me 2hrs load time but the warehouse crew Loaded the next two trucks that pulled up after me first. Try and get in door 1-4 since it’s closer to the machine that is making product and easier for them to load a truck. They told me door 6 - but I should have just backed into 2. After sitting in door 6 for 7 hrs they asked me to bump door 2. Lol. They have a porta-potty, allow overnight parking, and will eat up most of your clock. When I asked the Sup why they loaded the trucks that came after me first he said that is just how it rolls. He said you should have dropped your trailer and came back when we were done. Funny stuff since I am an owner operator doing spot freight.

name: SHAKIB DEER
text: Quick loading 40 minutes in and out

name: Daniel Terry
text: Save yourself the time and headache getting loaded here

name: Lori Hulbert (Tour Texas Hill Country)
text: I live in Dallas, TX and due to the storm that came through there are no water heaters in Dallas at this time.  I googled the store and spoke with Chris to see if there was any way they could use my FEDEX number and ship me a unit.  I know this is an unusual request, and he walked me through the process, explaining what would need to be done in order to make that happen.  He was professional, friendly and efficient, and they even drove my until to the shipping location so I didn't have to request a driver pick up.  We've been through such an ordeal here and Chris defiantly made me life easier!  A GREAT BIG TEXAS SIZED THANK YOU!

resp.text: Thank you, Lori! We are so glad we could help and we hope you guys are recovering after the storms! We will pass along your kind words to Chris. Thank you for your business and thank you for believing in Southern Pipe!

name: benjamin Gray
text: Southern Pipe and Supply's on site Fairhope cleak of the works, Chris, expedited my order professionally and knowledgably. He was curtious and friendly, made helpful recommendations and had me on my way, saving me time and money. It was a pleasure to have such good individualized service. Thanks very much. Ben

resp.text: Thank you very much, Ben! We appreciate your business!

resp.text: Greg, thank you very much for your kind words and your business

text: Difficult to find, road sign is missing for the road name and the road is on the backside of a hill. Staff wasn't in the office and had to wait for a loader for assistance.

name: John Higginbotham
text: I own a business in the Birmingham area. These guys are about as lazy as it gets. I ordered 10ft. pieces of 2” black pipe. Once I got there, they stated they only have 20ft. pieces and didn’t even offer to cut it. Lazy!

text: Wouldn't  take back a cash  ticket  that wasn't  but a day old. So probably  want be doing business  there again.

text: My first time to visit this business service was great worker were very helpful and very nice I give empire pipe and supply a 5 star  and as far as the Google maps great work took me right to the door I also give them a 5 star because it was over 100 miles from my house thanks for all your help

name: David Brazeal
text: This is the place to go for your environmental needs. I didn't know they sold to the public until I stopped by. The service was amazing and the staff are so nice and friendly. Give them a try!

name: S Gitter
text: Needed some drainage piping at the spur of the moment late in the afternoon. Went to Twin Oaks and they were able to help me figure out exactly what I needed, provided some custom joints, and delivered the next morning. Great service!

resp.text: Thanks Seth, we love working with customers to get exactly the products they need!

name: Jeremy Davis
text: This place is Awesome! They had everything we needed for our project and was so reasonable and helpful! thanks !

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback Jeremy, and thank you for the business!

name: William Neighbors
text: We've never had anything but exceptional service at Twin Oaks. The guys there are always willing to help you get the products you need to the job site.

resp.text: Thank You! We're always here to help.

name: Jamie Pouliot
text: This place does a good job for automatic car wash do yourself a favor and buy the monthly package for $35  and you can get up to 3 washes a day and each wash is like $21 retail .. free vacuums and they work good .. only complaint is they have air nosels for blowing all the dirt and stuff you cant reach with the vacume out of the crevices and they dont work and it would be nice to use and save alot of time .. and with the monthly package you can use the one in Cullman and another in Boaz

text: They are the best. Jerry went way out of his way to help me find a part so I could fabricate a solution to a broken cappuccino maker. All that hard work his part for a 91 cent sale. Customer service doesn't get any better than that. Nice to do business with people that know what they're doing instead of me standing around in a big box.

text: I have been doing business with C&B for over 7 years. Their customer service is AMAZING! text: If you need   plastic  Pipe or concrete that's where you get

name: William Jones
text: If you need pipe for drainage, or anything to do with septic systems, or french drain needs, or if your a major contractor that builds roads and major parking areas both public,  and private this is where you go, anything to do with concrete on or in a highway, bring your blueprints, or your ideas and they can build it for you and have your order ready and deliver within a reasonable time, also concrete pipe, they have one of only three machines in the whole world that makes there dry cast concrete pipe and already in stock and ready for shipment, Alabama, Florida,and Mississippi give em a call and they will help you out

name: Brian Graves
text: Great place for all your pipe and supply needs!

text: Pulled in as a one off customer at 7 am for a parking bumper. They treated me as an everyday customer and had me in and oiut in about 10 minutes. All staff were super nice.

name: Fud Pucker
text: Well.. first thing.. You cant teach an old dog new tricks. Second off.. Energy Pipe is an amazing place to work. Not one employee has ever gotten fired for doing their job as they should. It is very sad that after not working at a workplace for over a year you find the time to write reviews and harass the office still. This review should be seen by your future employers so they will know what they are getting themselves in to. I have worked for Energy Pipe and enjoyed the time I worked there. Treated with nothing but respect. I would highly recommend using Energy pipe for all of your PVF needs.

name: DremwasSimping
text: Professional and helpful.
